00335 template<class T>
00336 class Observer : public IObserver<T>
00337 {
00338 private:
00339     typedef void(T::*NotifyMethod)(INotification*);
00340     typedef T* NotifyContext;
00341     NotifyMethod notifyMethod;
00342     NotifyContext notifyContext;
00343 public:
00354     Observer( NotifyMethod method, NotifyContext context )
00355     {
00356         this->setNotifyMethod(method);
00357         this->setNotifyContext(context);
00358     }
00367     void setNotifyMethod( NotifyMethod method )
00368     {
00369         this->notifyMethod = method;
00370     }
00376     void setNotifyContext( NotifyContext context )
00377     {
00378         this->notifyContext = context;
00379     }
00385     NotifyMethod getNotifyMethod()
00386     {
00387         return this->notifyMethod;
00388     }
00394     NotifyContext getNotifyContext()
00395     {
00396         return this->notifyContext;
00397     }
00403     void notifyObserver( INotification* notification )
00404     {
00405         (this->notifyContext->*notifyMethod)(notification);
00406     }
00413     bool compareNotifyContext( IObserverFunctor* compareContext )
00414     {
00415         return &*compareContext == &*this->notifyContext;
00416     }
00417 };
